content: easy baby blanket ing-credible threads designs an easy design using only knit and purl stitches in a pretty checkerboard pattern with a seed stitch border size approx 28 wide and 32 long knitting 10 blocks across and 15 blocks long materials worsted wt yarn 450-500 yds size 10 needles gauge 16 stitches and 20 row in 4 in block pattern not essential for this project but use as a guide pattern cast on 110 stitches and knit in seed stitch for 6 row next row rs begin block pattern as follows seed st first 5 sts place marker pm k 10 p 10 across row to last 5 sts pm seed st last 5 sts continue for a total of 10 row slide markers sm as you come to them now you will change block pattern as follows seed st first 5 sts sm p10 k 10 across row to last 5 sts sm seed st last 5 sts continue alternating these 10 row blocks until desired length end with 6 row seed stitch removing markers bind off sew in ends block lightly design by ingrid ing-credible threads designs ravelry ingsknits etsy ingcredible threads
